content: {{knowledge objective |Identifiant=OIC-075-17-A |Item_parent=Smoking addiction |Item_parent_short=Smoking addiction |Rank=A |Title=Knowing the epidemiology of passive smoking, the main concepts of excess risk |Description=None |Rubric=Epidemiology |Contributors= |Order=17}} Non-psychiatric medical complications related to '''passive intoxication'''' * Ischaemic heart disease * Bronchopulmonary cancer * Coronary artery disease * Otitis and asthma in children * Bronchitis

question.title: What is a known non-psychiatric medical complication of passive smoking?

option_a.title: Otitis and asthma in children
option_a.description: A condition affecting the ears and lungs of young children

option_b.title: Coronary artery disease
option_b.description: A heart condition caused by poor blood flow

option_d.title: Ischaemic heart disease
option_d.description: A condition caused by reduced blood flow to the heart

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: The correct letter of the answer
